name: AS_7_4_Support_Remote_Healthcare_Services
title: AS.7.4 Support Remote Healthcare Services (Function)
description: Support remote health care services such as tele-health and remote device monitoring by integrating records and data collected by these means into the patient's record for care management, billing and public health reporting purposes.
purpose: Enables remote treatment of patients using monitoring devices, and two way communications between provider and patient or provider and provider. Promotes patient empowerment, self-determination and ability to maintain health status in the community. Promotes personal health, wellness and preventative care. For example, a diabetic pregnant mother can self-monitor her condition from her home and use web TV to report to her provider. The same TV-internet connectivity allows her to get dietary and other health promoting information to assist her with managing her high-risk pregnancy.

statement.label: AS.7.4#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture patient data from remote devices and integrate that data into the patient's record.

statement.label: AS.7.4#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to render patient data to remote devices.
